item.title: Untitled
item.dc:creator: Nora Jones
item.description: A new article created using the Distill format.

item.title: Quandl and Forecasting
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Regenstein
item.description: In this post, we will explore commodity prices using data from Quandl, a repository for both free and paid data sources. We will also get into the forecasting game a bit and think about how best to use dygraphs when visualizing predicted time series as an extension of historical data.

item.title: The Sharpe Ratio
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Regenstein
item.description: In this post we present a classic finance use case using the PerformanceAnalytics, quantmod, and dygraphs packages. We'll demonstrate importing stock data, building a portfolio, and then calculating the Sharpe Ratio.
